# API Surface: importers

*Auto-generated by Intelligent Analyzer*

| Name | Type | Description | Location |
|------|------|-------------|----------|
| Importer | interface | Abstract interface for platform-specific importers with import() and paginate() methods | external-importer.ts |
| GitHubImporter | class | Imports GitHub issues using Octokit REST client with pagination and rate limit handling | github-importer.ts |
| JiraImporter | class | Imports JIRA issues via REST API v3 with JQL queries, ADF description parsing, and multi-project support | jira-importer.ts |
| ADOImporter | class | Imports Azure DevOps work items (referenced but not shown in provided files) | ado-importer.ts |
| ImportCoordinator | class | Orchestrates parallel/sequential imports from multiple platforms with progress tracking and sync metadata | import-coordinator.ts |
| ItemConverter | class | Converts ExternalItem objects to living docs User Story markdown files with hierarchy mapping | item-converter.ts |
| MarkdownGenerator | class | Generates markdown content for User Stories, Features, and origin badges | markdown-generator.ts |
| DuplicateDetector | class | Scans living docs for existing external IDs to prevent re-importing duplicates | duplicate-detector.ts |
| RateLimiter | class | Monitors API rate limits and implements backoff strategies with configurable thresholds | rate-limiter.ts |
